carrotaws:cloud-formation-create

Full name:

com.carrotgarden.maven:carrot-maven-aws-plugin:1.1.0-SNAPSHOT:cloud-formation-create

Description:

create new cloud formation stack based on: name, template, parameters

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: test.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: prepare-package.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
stackName String - AWS CloudFormation stack name
Default value is: amazon-tester.
stackPropertiesOutputFile File - AWS CloudFormation stack create execution result output properties file
Default value is: ./target/formation/formation.properties.
stackServerId String - AWS CloudFormation login credentials stored in settings.xml under server id entry; username="aws key id", password="aws secret key";
Default value is: com.example.aws.stack.
stackTemplateFile File - AWS CloudFormation template file http ://aws.amazon.com/cloudformation/aws-cloudformation-templates/
Default value is: ./src/main/resources/formation.template.
stackTimeout Long - AWS CloudFormation operation timeout; seconds
Default value is: 600.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
stackInputParams Map - AWS CloudFormation stack input parameters

Parameter Details

stackInputParams:

AWS CloudFormation stack input parameters
  • Type: java.util.Map
  • Required: No

stackName:

AWS CloudFormation stack name
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: amazon-tester

stackPropertiesOutputFile:

AWS CloudFormation stack create execution result output properties file
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ./target/formation/formation.properties

stackServerId:

AWS CloudFormation login credentials stored in settings.xml under server id entry; username="aws key id", password="aws secret key";
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: com.example.aws.stack

stackTemplateFile:

AWS CloudFormation template file http ://aws.amazon.com/cloudformation/aws-cloudformation-templates/
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ./src/main/resources/formation.template

stackTimeout:

AWS CloudFormation operation timeout; seconds
  • Type: java.lang.Long
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: 600
